title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
notes: The window does not show up although Steam is busy trying to load it for sometime and although it appears in the task switcher, and then it eventually fails (window removed from the task switcher, Steam responding again)

title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
notes: Performance and stability wise the game runs great. The only issue I experienced is that the units are not rendered properly making them completely invisible.

title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
notes: No unit textures in DX11, just as with Wine.

title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
notes: No unit textures in DX11, just as with Wine.
Units are invisible in DX11 mode. Putting "-force-d3d9" in launch options solves the issue, though some DX11 graphical features may be disabled.
title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak

notes: Adding "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" to launch options fixes invisible unit bug. No other issues noted while playing through first mission.
title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak

notes: Invisible unit bug fixed as of Proton 3.16-3 beta. No tweaks or launch parameters necessary to play game as intended.
title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak

notes: Still needs "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" to fix invisible units
title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak

notes: Make sure to have both Proton 3.16-3 and Nvidia 396.54.09 drivers or appropriate RADV driver patches installed for proper stream output support to fix invisible units. (https://github.com/doitsujin/dxvk/issues/695)
title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
